keyEvents.title: Whitebeard Orders Evacuation
keyEvents.description: Whitebeard gives his final order for all pirates to evacuate Marineford as it begins to crumble.

keyEvents.title: Akainu's Provocation
keyEvents.description: Akainu insults Whitebeard to provoke Ace on the battlefield of Marineford.

keyEvents.title: Fire vs Magma Battle
keyEvents.description: Ace and Akainu clash on Marineford, with magma proving superior to fire.

keyEvents.title: Ace's Fatal Sacrifice
keyEvents.description: Ace shields Luffy from Akainu's attack and takes a fatal blow through his chest on the battlefield of Marineford.

reveals.information: Marineford is crumbling and being destroyed during the final stages of the war

keyEvents.title: Witnesses Ace's Fall via Broadcast
keyEvents.description: People in Sabaody Archipelago watch the broadcast of Ace being struck down at Marineford through the Visual Den Den Mushi.
